inclusion.criterion: BMI equal or greater than 35 kg/m2
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: American Society of Anesthesiologists (ASA) physical status I - III patients
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Scheduled to undergo laparoscopic roux-en-Y gastric bypass or gastric sleeve placement
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Treatment with continuous positive airway pressure (CPAP) in the past three months
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has COPD and is on CPAP, which are exclusion criteria. Overall assessment is likely ineligible due to these conditions.
